#summary Application overview

== Introduction ==

This application is intended to assist in building Buvdarbu Izcenojumu Katalogs (BIK) by MV project, SIA (Latvia).


== Details ==

The application uses PostgresSQL server as data storage and Java SWING for UI. Application allows user to maintain structured catalogue of construction estimations.
